bcbioSingleCell

Top Markers

Top Markers

topMarkers(object, ...)

# S4 method for grouped_df
topMarkers(object, n = 10L, direction = "positive",
  coding = TRUE)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
n

Number of genes per cluster.
direction

Whether to include only positive, negative, or both directions of association per cluster. Defaults to positive.
coding

Only include protein coding genes.

Value

tibble.

See also

  • dplyr::slice()

  • dplyr::top_n().

Other Clustering Utilities: knownMarkersDetected, plotKnownMarkersDetected, plotMarkers, plotPCElbow, plotTopMarkers, topBarcodes

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/seuratAllMarkers.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# grouped_df
topMarkers(seuratAllMarkers) %>% glimpse()
